description: This Black Devil Martini is the most festive-looking of all. But don't let its colorful sugar rim fool you. A classic, simple rum and vermouth base is underneath that tasty exterior, perfect for any night out on the town!
name: Black Devil Martini

recipeInstructions.name: Place the sugar in a small zip-top bag. Add a few drops of orange food coloring or a few drops of combined red and yellow food coloring to the sugar.
recipeInstructions.text: Place the sugar in a small zip-top bag. Add a few drops of orange food coloring or a few drops of combined red and yellow food coloring to the sugar.

recipeInstructions.name: Close the bag and shake vigorously to distribute the color. Spread the colored sugar out onto a plate. Run the lime wedge around the edge of each martini glass and dip it onto the plate with the colored sugar.
recipeInstructions.text: Close the bag and shake vigorously to distribute the color. Spread the colored sugar out onto a plate. Run the lime wedge around the edge of each martini glass and dip it onto the plate with the colored sugar.

recipeInstructions.name: Add the dark rum and dry vermouth to each glass. Garnish with several blackberries, serve and enjoy!
